steps.name: When User logs in with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
And User selects product "Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt"
And User adds the product to the cart
And User clicks on cart icon and proceeds to checkout
And User enters first name "Upasana", last name "pal", and postal code "411047"
And User clicks the continue button
Then Product "Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt" should be visible in checkout overview
And Total amount should be displayed
When User clicks the finish button
Then Confirmation message "Thank you for your order!" should be displayed
